results.name: SKEETER AND THE SKATE STUMP SHOWDOWN
Strange guy with one bullet VS zombies
Intern: An Intern's Guide to Maintaining Internal Rage

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 2.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DX9 (shader model 3.0) capability
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 3.3 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DX9 (shader model 3.0) capability
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
